entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Cape Dorset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Dorset Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: W 55 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard developing this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
